body.name: Metal Desk Lamp Rustic Task Lamp Black Adjustable, Industrial Style Lamp with On/Off Switch, Vintage Work Lamp, Reading Lamp for Bedroom, Study Room &Office, ETL Certificate. (Black01-3S)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 11 mins
features: VINTAGE STYLE: Vintage-style metal desk lamp, the perfect addition to any industrial, farmhouse, rustic, or vintage decor. This stylish lamp is ideal for use in your home, office, library, or cafe, adding a touch of elegance to any space.

ADJUSTABLE DESK LAMP: Our desk lamp is flexible and the lamp head is adjustable. Height/ Tilt Adjustable HEIGHT, the knob on the post allows you to control how high you want the light, best for protecting your neck and eye. Create custom lighting moods by swiveling the lamp head 180° for uplight or downlight. Concentrate the light downward for reading or crafts such as sewing and knitting. Directional Lighting allows you to focus the light where you need it!

3-LEVEL ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS: This led desk lamp has three light brightness modes: low-medium-high, which is convenient for any scene, like reading, working, or daily use. Each lighting mode is gentle and relaxing on the eyes. It is both functional and aesthetic. With its powerful lighting effect and high-quality lamp fixture, this desk lamps provides bright and soft lighting that's perfect for any indoor space.

STURDY LAMP BASE: The heavy base makes this lamp very unlikely to tip, even if knocked by kids or pets. The lamppost and lampshade are made entirely of metal before being slightly distressed and finished in aged bronze with gold highlights hand-painted by experienced artisans for both elegance and durability. The sturdy heavy lamp base makes this lamp more stable.

ETL CERTIFICATED: Outstanding quality and unparalleled safety proven with ETL certificate. We are committed to giving you premium quality products and a good shopping experience. If your floor lamp does not meet your needs, please send us an email and we will reply to you to solve the problem for you. We will provide you with quick and friendly.
body.description: This LED desk lamp features three adjustable brightness levels, low-medium-high, for convenient use in any scene. Each lighting mode is gentle and relaxing on the eyes, making it both functional and aesthetic. The lamp base is heavy and sturdy, making it unlikely to tip even if knocked by kids or pets. The entire lamp is made of high-quality metal, finished in aged bronze with gold highlights hand-painted by experienced artisans, providing both elegance and durability. Our desk lamp is ETL-certified, ensuring outstanding quality and unparalleled safety. The vintage-style metal desk lamp is a stylish, adjustable, and flexible lighting solution that adds elegance and functionality to any space. With its outstanding quality and safety certification, you can trust this lamp to provide bright and soft lighting for all your indoor needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Work Desk Light
reviews.reviewText: Yes, this lamp is on the large side; measure and be sure it works in your space so you don't cry about it later. It is metal with a heavy base for stability. Assembly is very minimal and the fit and finish on the one I received was perfect. I like that the switch is up by the light so you don't have to pat down the cord every time you want to turn it on and off. Not obvious in the copy or pictures is that in addition to the height adjustment knob on the lower stem, there is also a knob at the top between the shade and the top of the stem to keep the shade and light positioned where you want it, and the knob actually holds the shade in place, unlike so many others. The included bulb is medium/warm with just the right easy on the eyes brightness when trained on a work space. It might help to light up a corner, but there are other lamps to use if you want to light up your whole room. Overall this lamp seems well made and likely durable. It is good value if you like the industrial/retro design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful lamps, solidly built
reviews.reviewText: We ordered two for our night stands. They are substantial, tall and heavy, as described, which is what we wanted. I like the ability to adjust the direction and the height of the light. The finish does show the lines of the machining if you look closely, and the manufacturer responded quickly to an inquiry about it, but we realized that’s not so important to us, and the quality is quite impressive. The lamps were well packaged and arrived quickly. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy base, easy to assemble, and keeps the room nicely lit when I don't want the "big light on." I don't care for the "brushed metal" look the lamp has, as it just makes it look dirty to me. The bulbs have three different light modes which you have to cycle through, Warm, Cool, and Neutral. I'm sure they can be switched out to avoid always having to cycle back to the mode you want. All in all it's a sturdy lamp and does what it was meant to do while looking aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how you can adjust the height and angle of the shade. I have a floor lamp exactly the same.

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Looks ok, just don’t look too close
reviews.reviewText: Had more plastic parts than I anticipated. I know I didn’t pay a lot for it, but it’s definitely a cheap lamp. Looks good from a distance.
